top_reasons.details: Current time underwater exceeds the strategy's own historical tolerance
Worst loss is extremely large relative to typical move
This free check uses trade data only. Market regimes, volatility stress, and portfolio overlap are evaluated inside Build Alpha.

reasons.details: Current time underwater exceeds the strategy's own historical tolerance
Worst loss is extremely large relative to typical move
This free check uses trade data only. Market regimes, volatility stress, and portfolio overlap are evaluated inside Build Alpha.

explanations.label: Edge strength (evidence)
explanations.plain_english: Measures how consistently returns differ from noise given variability and sample size.

explanations.label: Profit concentration
explanations.plain_english: If a few big wins dominate profits, results are fragile and harder to repeat.

explanations.label: Tail risk (worst loss vs typical)
explanations.plain_english: Compares the single worst loss to a typical trade move; high values indicate tail risk.

explanations.label: Current drawdown vs normal
explanations.plain_english: Compares current drawdown to the strategy's own historical drawdowns.

explanations.label: Time underwater vs normal
explanations.plain_english: Compares current time underwater to typical drawdown durations.

explanations.label: Most recent loss vs extreme history
explanations.plain_english: Compares the most recent loss to the historical extreme loss tail.
